channel.title: Blog on José Caique
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on José Caique

item.title: Roadmap android
item.description: As described in the youtube video here you can find the android roadmap. Try your best to get a solid understanding of what are you studing, so when the time pass you will for sure become a strong android dev. Fingers crossed!

item.title: Keep your feature simple
item.description: Introduction There is a natural tendency to define patterns that facilitate the development of new features in order to maintain a certain consistency among the various functionalities of an application. Such patterns can be useful, for example, when adding a new team member who may find it easier to contribute to a project since every functionality has more or less the same structure. However, it is essential to always think about the utility that a piece of code adds to the project.
